description: Canada has a requirement to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of pursuit tires.This requirement is to establish a National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for all Federal Government Departments and Provincial/Territorial Identified Users across Canada, for the procurement of pursuit tires and tubes and airless tires excluding maintenance and installation for various vehicle categories.The period of the NMSOs will be for a one-year period from 2024-04-01 to 2025-03-31.
tags: 1995-World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Canada-Europe Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement on Trade (CETA)
full_summary:
# Canada's National Master Standing Offer for Pursuit Tires

## Request for Standing Offer

The Government of Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to respond to this Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) for the supply of pursuit tires.

### Solicitation Overview

*   Solicitation Number: WS4332084015
*   Publication Date: February 13, 2024
*   Closing Date: March 14, 2024 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time

### Product Requirement

Canada has a requirement to establish a NMSO for the procurement of pursuit tires, tubes, and airless tires, excluding maintenance and installation, for various vehicle categories.

*   estimate annual usage: 12,000 pursuit tires

## Standing Offer Period

*   Offer period: April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025

*   Standing Offer will allow the supply of pursuit tires and related products to identified end users across Canada

## Key Buyer Information

*   Procuring Entity: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
*   Buyer's Name: Salouane, Baderllama
*   Contact Email: [baderllama.salouane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:baderllama.salouane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and more...

## Regions of Supply

*   New Brunswick
*   Alberta
*   Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
*   Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
*   Nova Scotia
*   Prince Edward Island
*   Manitoba
*   Saskatchewan
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   British Columbia
*   National Capital Region

## Notice Document

The complete notice document can be found by visiting the following link: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782789?extsite=MTg3ODI3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: All necessary information is extracted and formatted to provide a clear outline of what's inside the original document. There is no irrelevant information included to ensure you have a clear vision of the request for standing offer
